name: heat and power co-generation unit construction, organic Rankine cycle, 1400kW thermal, components for electricity only | heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, 1400kW thermal, components for electricity only | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3911/documentation

This dataset represents the construction of components of a 1400 kWth cogeneration plant. The dataset represents all components necessary only for electricity production.

From unoccupied land forseen for the construction of a cogeneration plant.

This activity ends with components of a cogeneration plant necessary for electricity production, having a lifetime of 20 years.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for a specific Swiss cogeneration plant. Dataset could be used for similarly dimensioned cogeneration plants in other regions.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The 1400 kWth cogeneration plant is supplied with wood chips automatically. The electricity production takes place through an Organic Ranking Cycle using a steam turbine and a multi-cyclone filter.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data from one specific 5 MW cogeneration plant, installed in Switzerland.
